TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1015
TEI.2.document_title: John P. Coles to Stephen F. Austin, 01-11-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: John P. Coles to Austin, January 11, 1825. Land transfers
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1015

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*John P. Coles to Austin, January 11, 1825. Land transfers*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**date_mentioned n="01-11-1825">11th January 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*You will find inclosed the Transfer of *person_mentioned*Brooks*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Speers*/person_mentioned* the original or the Coppy that was delivered to *person_mentioned*Brooks*/person_mentioned* he carryed off *person_mentioned*Speers*/person_mentioned* has assigned his name on the note given by *person_mentioned*Brooks*/person_mentioned* for Sixty five dollars, to be paid in Specys It will be due next *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1826">October*/date_mentioned* the note I will hand to you on sight*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jno P Coles*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Addressed:] Col. *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San filipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*Mr. Berry*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
